name: EXON: The Impossible Challenge
description: A fast paced stealth game for those who have enough courage to face the impossible.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64-bit Windows 7 or higher Processor: 3.2 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti or higher DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
